title: 6/12/17 - Time for Armageddon Al Gore to admit he was wrong?
description:
Do you believe there are Comey tapes? ...Time for hearings on Loretta Lynch? ...Megyn Kelly in trouble? ...The mainstreaming of Alex Jones ... Time for Al Gore to admit he was wrong about global warming? ...The seeds of ISIS were planted a century ago ...Borders are about to be redrawn in the Middle East ...Jeff Goldblum's roles in cinematic history

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
